column2: p <â€ ggplot(data = no_of_customers) + geom_mosaic(aes(weight = customer_count, x = product(PREMIUM_CUSTOMER, LIFESTAGE), fill = PREMIUM_CUSTOMER)) + labs(x = "Lifestage", y = "Premium customer flag", title = "Proportion of customers") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5))+ geom_text(data = ggplot_build(p)$data[[1]], aes(x = (xmin + xmax)/2 , y = (ymin + ymax)/2, label = as.character(paste(round(.wt/sum(.wt),3)*100, '%'))))
